page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER IN SEDGEFIELD
page.content: IN SEDGEFIELD THERE IS ONE SMALL POLICE STATION AND A LAW COURT. SEDGEFIELD POLICE STATION GET ABOUT FOUR ARRESTS EVERY WEEK.MOST OF THEM ARE FOR QUITE COMMON THINGS LIKE SPEEDING OR A BURGLARY. THE POLICE ONLY HAVE ONE POLICE CAR.IN THE WHOLE STATION THERE ARE NINE POLICE MEN AND ONE POLICE WOMAN.THE POLICE WORK TWENTYFOUR HOURS A DAY, THEY WORK IN SHIFTS. THE LAW COURTS ARE IN THE VILLAGE. THEY GET CASES FROM SPEEDING TO ASSAULT. INSTEAD OF A JUDGE THERE ARE THREE MAGISTRATES.THERE IS ALSO A JURY WITH TWELVE PEOPLE IN IT. THE SENTENCES THAT ARE HANDED OUT ARE MAINLY FINES.YOU CAN BE FINED FROM TEN POUNDS TO ONE THOUSAND POUNDS.THE SIZE OF THE FINE DEPENDS ON WHAT CRIME HAS BEEN COMMITTED.PRISON SENTENCES ARE GIVEN FOR MORE SERIOUS CRIMES.
